title: Patrick Dempsey
summary: Patrick Galen Dempsey (born January 13, 1966)[1] is an American actor and race car driver, best known for his role as neurosurgeon Derek "McDreamy" Shepherd in Grey's Anatomy. He has also appeared in a variety of films such as Heaven Help Us (1985), Loverboy (1989), Hugo Pool (1997), Scream 3 (2000), Sweet Home Alabama (2002), Iron Jawed Angels (2004), Valentine's Day (2010), and Bridget Jones's Baby (2016).
